name: redmyne
description: Personal workload management for Redmine - track your issues, log time, visualize capacity

commands.title: Redmyne: List open issues assigned to me
Redmyne: Actions for issue under cursor

viewsWelcome.contents:
No kanban tasks yet.
[Add Task](command:redmyne.kanban.add)

---

**Tips:**
- Right-click tasks for actions
- Drag tasks between columns
- Link tasks to Redmine issues

redmyne.logging.enabled.description: Log API requests/responses to output channel

redmyne.autoUpdateDonePercent.description: Auto-update % Done based on spent/estimated hours when logging time. Caps at 99% (100% must be manual). Skips if over budget.

redmyne.showCalculatedPriority.description: Show calculated priority score in Gantt tooltips (based on due date urgency, downstream dependencies, external blocks)

redmyne.workingHours.weeklySchedule.markdownDescription: Working hours per day (0-24). Set 0 for non-working days. Used for utilization calculations.

redmyne.statusBar.showWorkload.markdownDescription:
**Show workload overview in status bar**

Displays remaining work and capacity buffer.

**Note:** Opt-in to reduce noise. Enable if you need capacity planning at a glance.

**Format:** `25h left, +8h buffer`

redmyne.gantt.visibleRelationTypes.markdownDescription:
**Relation types to show as dependency arrows**

**Standard:**
- `blocks` / `precedes`  Scheduling relations (default)
- `relates`  General association
- `duplicates` / `copied_to`  Tracking

**Gantt plugin (if installed):**
- `finish_to_start` (FS), `start_to_start` (SS)
- `finish_to_finish` (FF), `start_to_finish` (SF)

redmyne.gantt.perfDebug.markdownDescription:
**Enable performance logging**

Logs timing data to console for debugging performance issues.

**Note:** For development only.

redmyne.maxConcurrentRequests.markdownDescription:
**Maximum concurrent API requests**

Limits how many requests run simultaneously to prevent server overload.

- **2** (default): Safe for most servers
- **5-10**: For faster servers
- **20**: Maximum, use if server handles high load

Reduce if you see 503 errors. Increase for faster data loading.
